sect1.title: Klasse Resttool
sect1.para: You may import or query repository entries with Resttool as well generate, create or query users of an openolat LMS instance.

sect1.title: Klasse RestConnection
sect1.para: Description: Manage a connection to the grizzly server used by the unit test with some helpers methods. Initial Date: 20 d√©c. 2011

sect2.title: RestConnection()RestConnectionMethodsRestConnection
sect2.para: Default constructor creates a new RestConnection instance.

sect2.xreflabel: RestConnection(java.lang.String, int, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
sect2.title: RestConnection(String, int, String, String, String, String)RestConnectionMethodsRestConnection
stringuified(Object)stringuifiedMethodsstringuified
sect2.para: Make string representation of a JSON object.

sect1.title: Klasse Course
sect1.para: Import or query courses via RESTful web service.

sect2.title: importCourse(File, File)importCourseMethodsimportCourse
sect2.para: Imports a course via RESTful web service.

entry.para: the file to safe the course's attributes.
the course as a ZIP file

sect2.title: queryCourse(File)queryCourseMethodsqueryCourse
sect2.para: Queries courses via RESTful web service.

entry.para: the file to safe the queried courses

sect1.title: Klasse RepositoryEntry
sect1.para: Import or query repository entries via RESTful web service.

sect2.title: importRepositoryEntry(File, File)importRepositoryEntryMethodsimportRepositoryEntry
sect2.para: Imports a repository entry via RESTful web service.

entry.para: the file to safe the repository entry's attributes.
the repository entry as a ZIP file

sect2.title: queryRepositoryEntry(File)queryRepositoryEntryMethodsqueryRepositoryEntry
sect2.para: Queries repository entries via RESTful web service.

entry.para: the file to safe the queried repository entries

sect1.title: Klasse User
sect1.para: Generate, import or query users via RESTful web service. You may set the appropriate properties to configure parameters of user generation.

sect2.title: generateUser(File, int)generateUserMethodsgenerateUser
sect2.para: Generates users via RESTful web service.

entry.para: the file to safe the generated user attributes
the count of users to be created

sect2.title: importUser(File, File)importUserMethodsimportUser
sect2.para: Imports users via RESTful web service.

entry.para: the file containing the user's attributes.

sect2.title: queryUser(File)queryUserMethodsqueryUser
sect2.para: Queries existing users via RESTful web service.

entry.para: the file to safe the queried user attributes.

sect1.title: Klasse CsvHelper
sect1.para: Some helper methods for handling comma separated values (CSV) files.

sect2.title: readCsv(File, char)readCsvMethodsreadCsv
sect2.para: Reads a CSV file into a string array.

entry.para: a string array whereas each field has its own entry

sect2.title: writeCourseToCsv(File, char, boolean, CourseVO)writeCourseToCsvMethodswriteCourseToCsv
sect2.para: Writes the course's attributes to CSV file you may specify whether to overwrite or to append the file.

sect2.title: writeCourseToCsv(OutputStream, char, CourseVO)writeCourseToCsvMethodswriteCourseToCsv
sect2.para: Writes the course's attributes to CSV output stream.

sect2.title: writeUserToCsv(File, char, boolean, List<UserVO>)writeUserToCsvMethodswriteUserToCsv
sect2.para: Writes the attributes of the users to CSV file you may specify whether to overwrite or to append the file.

entry.para: if false the file will be deleted first else the users will be append to end

sect2.title: writeUserToCsv(File, char, boolean, UserVO)writeUserToCsvMethodswriteUserToCsv
sect2.para: Writes the user's attributes to CSV file you may specify whether to overwrite or to append the file.

entry.para: if false the file will be deleted first else the user will be append to end

sect2.title: writeUserToCsv(OutputStream, char, UserVO)writeUserToCsvMethodswriteUserToCsv
sect2.para: Writes the user's attributes to CSV ouput stream.
